thread.title: Ground News - US Defence Secretary issues apology to Biden after not disclosing recent hospitalisation
thread.title_full: Ground News - US Defence Secretary issues apology to Biden after not disclosing recent hospitalisation

author: Sky News Australia
title: Ground News - US Defence Secretary issues apology to Biden after not disclosing recent hospitalisation
text: US Defence Secretary issues apology to Biden after not disclosing recent hospitalisation US Defence Secretary Summary by Sky News Australia [Lloyd Austin](https://ground.news/interest/lloyd-austin)has issued an apology to President Joe Biden for hiding a recent hospitalisation from the White House. Mr Austin was admitted to hospital on New Year's Day after complications from prostate cancer surgery. It was revealed the White House was unaware of his absence and time in the ICU until several days later. Many US lawmakers called for Mr Austin to be removed from his role at the Pentagon over the breach of tr… 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right [] Sky News Australia US Defence Secretary issues apology to Biden after not disclosing recent hospitalisation US Defence Secretary Lloyd Austin has issued an apology to President Joe Biden for hiding a recent hospitalisation from the White House. Mr Austin was admitted to hospital on New Year's Day after complications from prostate cancer surgery. It was revealed the White House was unaware of his absence and time in the ICU until several days later.
